00023 template <class Base, class Gui>
00024 class TQtDocumentManagerWrap: public Base, public Gui
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Base BaseClass;
00028        typedef typename BaseClass::Ids Ids;
00029 
00030        // pseudo-reimplemented (iqtgui::TRestorableGuiWrap)
00031        virtual void OnRestoreSettings(const QSettings& settings);
00032        virtual void OnSaveSettings(QSettings& settings) const;
00033 
00034        // pseudo-reimplemented (idoc::CSingleDocumentManagerBase)
00035        virtual QString GetSaveFilePath(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const;
00036 
00037 protected:
00042        QStringList CreateFileDialogFilters(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr = NULL, int flags = 0) const;
00043 
00044        void UpdateLastDirectory(const QString& filePath) const;
00045        virtual QStringList GetOpenFilePathesFromDialog(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr) const;
00046 
00047 private:
00048        mutable QString m_lastDirectory;
00049 };

00054 // pseudo-reimplemented (TRestorableGuiWrap)
00055 
00056 template <class Base, class Gui>
00057 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::OnRestoreSettings(const QSettings& settings)
00058 {
00059        QVariant valueNotSet = QVariant(-1);
00060 
00061        QVariant lastDirectory = settings.value("Workspace/LastOpenDocumentDirectory", valueNotSet);
00062 
00063        if (lastDirectory != valueNotSet){
00064               m_lastDirectory = lastDirectory.toString();
00065        }
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 template <class Base, class Gui>
00070 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::OnSaveSettings(QSettings& settings) const
00071 {
00072        settings.setValue("Workspace/LastOpenDocumentDirectory", m_lastDirectory);
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 // pseudo-reimplemented (idoc::CSingleDocumentManagerBase)
00077 
00078 template <class Base, class Gui>
00079 QString TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::GetSaveFilePath(const QByteArray& documentTypeId) const
00080 {
00081        QStringList filters = CreateFileDialogFilters(&documentTypeId, ifile::IFilePersistence::QF_FILE | ifile::IFilePersistence::QF_SAVE);
00082 
00083        QString filePath = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(NULL, Gui::tr("Save..."), m_lastDirectory, filters.join("\n"));
00084 
00085        UpdateLastDirectory(filePath);
00086 
00087        return filePath;
00088 }
00089

00091 // protected methods
00092 
00093 template <class Base, class Gui>
00094 QStringList TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::CreateFileDialogFilters(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr, int flags) const
00095 {
00096        QStringList filters;
00097 
00098        Ids docTypeIds = BaseClass::GetDocumentTypeIds();
00099 
00100        QStringList allExt;
00101 
00102        if (documentTypeIdPtr != NULL){
00103               ifile::IFileTypeInfo* typeInfoPtr = BaseClass::GetDocumentFileTypeInfo(*documentTypeIdPtr);
00104               if (typeInfoPtr != NULL){
00105                      iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp::AppendLoaderFilterList(*typeInfoPtr, flags, allExt, filters);
00106               }
00107        }
00108        else{
00109               for (         typename Ids::const_iterator docTypeIter = docTypeIds.begin();
00110                                    docTypeIter != docTypeIds.end();
00111                                    ++docTypeIter){
00112                      ifile::IFileTypeInfo* typeInfoPtr = BaseClass::GetDocumentFileTypeInfo(*docTypeIter);
00113                      if (typeInfoPtr != NULL){
00114                             iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp::AppendLoaderFilterList(*typeInfoPtr, flags, allExt, filters);
00115                      }
00116               }
00117        }
00118 
00119        if ((allExt.size() > 1) && ((flags & ifile::IFilePersistence::QF_SAVE) == 0)){
00120               filters.prepend(Gui::tr("All known documents (%1)").arg("*." + allExt.join(" *.")));
00121        }
00122 
00123        return filters;
00124 }
00125 
00126 template <class Base, class Gui>
00127 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::UpdateLastDirectory(const QString& filePath) const
00128 {
00129        QFileInfo fileInfo(filePath);
00130 
00131        m_lastDirectory = fileInfo.dir().absolutePath();
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 template <class Base, class Gui>
00136 QStringList TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base, Gui>::GetOpenFilePathesFromDialog(const QByteArray* documentTypeIdPtr) const
00137 {
00138        QStringList filters = CreateFileDialogFilters(documentTypeIdPtr, ifile::IFilePersistence::QF_FILE | ifile::IFilePersistence::QF_LOAD);
00139 
00140        return QFileDialog::getOpenFileNames(Gui::GetWidget(), Gui::tr("Open Files..."), m_lastDirectory, filters.join("\n"));
00141 }
